title: Addition to Lawrence Hall: Window Design: LH-23
inscriptions: l.r. in pencil: LH-23 [encircled]; l.r. in red crayon: Addition/ to/ Lawrence Hall; verso in pencil: leads/flat/ 3/8"scant/ or 15/16/ [arrow symbol] the diamonds/ in the old chapel/ that Prof. Weston/ likes; verso in pencil: [diamond shaped window sketch]; verso u.c. in ink: Lawrence Hall - Wms.Coll/ main Bldg/ Add to South/ and Blashfield Room; verso c. in ink: Lawrence Hall - old bldg and/ all additions
